creator: Five Cell
title: How to create regular tetrahedron in 3d CAD
description: This project explores different methods for creating a regular tetrahedron (a three-sided pyramid with all edges of equal length) in 3D CAD software, specifically Autodesk Inventor. It aims to demonstrate the strengths of CAD programs and modeling techniques, highlighting the challenges in achieving perfect geometric accuracy.
steps: Open a new part in Autodesk Inventor.
Select a plane and begin a new sketch.
Draw a simple triangle and add the constraint of equality to each side to create an equilateral triangle. Optionally, constrain the triangle with respect to the origin.
Extrude the pyramid. In the extrude pop-up menu select the 'more' tab.
In the Taper field, enter '70.5288-90'. This is the approximate value of arccos(1/3)-90, which provides the draft angle for each face, creating an approximate tetrahedron.
